segments.text: Could you give some information on your European tours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our pleasure . We have several package tours you may choose , from ten days to three weeks in Europe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would be interested in a ten-day trip around Christmas time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have one ten-day tour that is still available . It will depart from New York on December 24th .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The price for one person for a ten-day tour is only 1,099 US dollars , which includes round trip airfare .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds reasonable . Let me think it over . And I'll call your back to make reservation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , but don't delay too long , or that trip will be all booked .
segments.speaker: S2
